title: New to Pixel 3. May Security update announced 5/7. As of 5/14 no update avail. When will I see it?
content:
Looking for the May 2019 Security Update which was announced as beginning availability on 5/7. As of 5/14 no update presents after doing the prescribed check - System>Advanced>System Update.

How long after the announcement is it reasonable to expect the update to arrive on my Pixel 3? 

Is there an alternate procedure that will force the update?
